abstract: Two marketing companies, 33Across and Media6Degrees, track interactions on sites like Facebook to tailor their advertising to more likely customers.
snippet: Two marketing companies, 33Across and Media6Degrees, track interactions on sites like Facebook to tailor their advertising to more likely customers.
lead_paragraph: IF a marketer asked people to hand over a list of all their friends so it could show them ads, few would comply. On social-networking sites like Facebook and MySpace, though, friendships are obvious, and advertisers are beginning to examine those connections.

headline.main: The Online Ad That Knows Where Your Friends Shop
headline.print_headline: The Online Ad That Knows Where Your Friends Shop
